Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.24473083]MERS-COV(Middle East respiratory syndrome coronavirus):inhibition of cell–cell fusion infection in Huh-7 and 293T/MERS/EGFP cells (IC50=0.93±0.15µM); inhibition of MERS-CoV infection in Vero cells (IC50=0.6µM); inhibition of MERS-CoV infection in Calu-3 cells (IC50=0.6µM); inhibition of MERS-CoV infection in HFL cells (IC50=13.9µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: [Ref.24473083]HR2P has low or no in vitro toxic effect.
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: interact with the viral HR1 domain to form heterologous 6-HB and block viral fusion coreformation, resulting in inhibition of MERS-CoV S protein-mediated membrane fusion.

Literature.Title: Structure-based discovery of Middle East respiratory syndrome coronavirus fusion inhibitor.
Literature.Author: Lu L, Liu Q, Zhu Y, Chan KH, Qin L, Li Y, Wang Q, Chan JF, Du L, Yu F, Ma C, Ye S, Yuen KY, Zhang R, Jiang S.
